instances.text: Course Subject Default CCP View Security Work Set

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Pre-requisites for this pilot course are: One of BMEG 373, ELEC 473.
Students without the pre-requisites will be dropped before the course starts. 
Students may contact the course instructor for permission to be registered if they completed a course related to microfluidics or other fluids/transport in mechanical or chemical engineering or have hands-on experience in microfluidics/MEMS.

Please note the following course format: 
Laboratory: WEDNESDAYS 9AM-11AM

Lecture: WEDNESDAYS 11AM-12PM

Discussion: FRIDAYS 1pm-2pm

instances.text: BMEG_V 400-Q_201 - MEDICAL IMAGE PROCESSING AND MACHINE LEARNING (Q)

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Pre-requisites: ELEC 221 & STAT 251. Students without the pre-requisites for the course will be dropped from the course.

Please note Thursdays 3:00PM-6:00PM is a lab, not lecture.

instances.text: BMEG_V 470-201 - Cellular  Responses  to Forces and Biomaterials
BMEG_V 474-201 - Stem Cells and Regenerative Medicine

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: Students must be in fourth year, have a minimum average of 80% in third year, and have the permission of the instructor to enroll. To register for the course, please review the instructions on https://www.bme.ubc.ca/bmeg-490/

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: BMEG students are supposed to take BMEG 495, instead of MTRL 495. The course does require knowledge in materials and it requires APSC278 as a pre-requisite.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: Registration for this course is restricted to students in the Diploma in Accounting Program. If you are a current DAP student, please visit myUBCDAP for more information on how to register.

instances.text: BUSI_V 414-202 - Data Visualization and Business Analytics

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Registration restriction alert: Registration for this course is restricted to students in the Diploma in Accounting Program. If you are a current DAP student, please visit myUBCDAP for more information on how to register.

Course format alert: This is a hybrid (live online) class - classes are held online during the scheduled class time, with mid-term and final exams held in-person at the UBC Point Grey campus.

detailResultFields.value:
Students with a time conflict should contact undergrad@chbe.ubc.cato arrange for conflict approvals.
The instructor will arrange class meeting frequency and times convenient for all registered students in the thesis proposal courses. For registration assistance, contact undergrad@chbe.ubc.ca.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
